description:
This event is for the CBB game between Binghamton Bearcats and Albany Great Danes on January 15 at 6:30 PM ET.

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.

If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

markets.description:
In the upcoming CBB game, scheduled for January 15 at 6:30 PM ET:

This market will resolve to "Albany Great Danes" if the Albany Great Danes win the game by 5 or more points.

Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Binghamton Bearcats". 

The result will be determined based on the final score including any overtime periods.

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed. If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.
